Vice President, Product ManagementLocation: Remote - USAbout Higg:Higg is the sustainability insights platform for consumer goods businesses – delivering software and services for measuring, managing, and sharing supply chain performance data.From materials to products, from facilities to stores, from emissions to working conditions, Higg unlocks a complete view of a business’s social and environmental impact.Built on the leading framework for sustainability measurement, Higg is trusted by global brands, retailers, and manufacturers to provide the single source of ESG intelligence they need to accelerate business and industry transformation.Launched in 2019 as a public-benefit corporation, Higg is the exclusive licensee of the Higg Index, the industry-leading value chain measurement methodology developed by the Sustainable Apparel Coalition.The Opportunity:We currently have an opening for a key leader in our organization. Reporting to the Chief Technology Officer, the Vice President of Product Management will oversee an existing and highly competent team of Product Managers as we emerge the next generation of supply chain sustainability tools. Our roadmap is robust, ambitious, and highly technical, so this leader must be equal parts thought-leader and team-leader, with the ability to go deep and understand the problems and possible solutions.The successful candidate will be biased towards a focus on flawless GTM activities, understand how to generate / validate new products, business models, and partnerships, and be able to adapt to a complex and changing environment. Working with a staggeringly wide variety of customers that range from some of the most venerable companies in the world to a rural factory in Bangladesh, they will work to define and deliver products that create a more sustainable and equitable supply chain. Our product mix is deep and wide, so this individual must be able to acquire, synthesize, and leverage complex and nuanced information to define and execute on our product roadmap. Most importantly, this role must nurture and grow the Product Management team to create our next generation of product leadership.What You'll Do:Lead a team of 7 Product Managers to deliver next generation supply chain sustainability tools.Manage an evolving roadmap in a dynamic environment against a complex and nuanced suite of products.Engage with Data, Engineering, Customer Success, and Executive teams to define, build, and evolve a rich and complex set of products, services, and tools for managing complex product value chains.Design and execute complex GTM strategies, including pricing, positioning, roadmap, partnerships, and full life cycle execution, from Pilot to Product. Engage deeply with an international customer and partner eco-system, working to understand their needs and advocate for our solutions.Grow the capabilities of your team and build a high-performance product management culture.Emerge an opinionated perspective on the future of our products and services.We'd Like to See (but not all are required):Demonstrable experience in supply chain management or sustainability/ESG tooling.Delivery of complex products through networks of channel partnersExperience with Big Data or ML/AI systemsProven track record of execution against a complex roadmap management with on-time / market-aligned delivery.A mix of startup and corporate experience that shows the ability to not only create the infrastructure you need, but also to not break the infrastructure that already exists.Ability to communicate strategies, decisions, and trade-offs to executive leadershipDeeply data driven but also comfortable driving from intuition in pursuit of new ideas.Strong product marketing knowledge/experience.Proven GTM skills, launching relevant products with the right business model to a waiting and excited audience.Experience with both user-facing products and API offerings.10+ years of Product Management or Product Marketing leadership experience.Exceptional interpersonal communication and presentation skillsWhat We Can Offer You:Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance offered through multiple PPO options. 90% employee premium and 60% spouse/dependent premium covered by Higg.Company sponsored 401k with up to 4% match Incentive Stock Options100% Parental Paid Leave Unlimited PTO12 company holidaysLife at HiggWe’re motivated by the opportunity to help customers improve every aspect of the trillion-dollar industries that touch everyone’s lives. We want business to change for good, but in a way that adds up to industry-scale change, because no business can change the world alone and doing just one thing for a positive headline won't change our world fast enough. Agree?Be part of a team that includes software engineers, sustainability professionals, business leaders, marketers, designers, artists, number crunchers and more than a handful of farmers! (From backyard mushrooms to multi-acre orchards.)Surround yourself with the kindest, smartest, most enthusiastic and dedicated people you’ll ever meet, who dream big, listen well, learn from their mistakes and when things go wrong, pull together to help each other out.Enjoy benefits including unlimited PTO, flexible working locations, benefits packaging which includes health (medical, dental, vision) and flexible spending benefits, and retirement matching plan.Because Higg is on a mission to change how things are made, for the planet and each of us on it, we believe it’s essential to reflect the diversity of those we strive to serve. We’re an equal opportunity employer dedicated to building a culturally and experientially diverse team that leads and works with empathy and respect.Powered by JazzHRRG52OV7SKM
